definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: That old house is an eerie place even in the day.
sentences.chinese: 那栋老屋即使在白天也有一种神秘可怖的气氛。

sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 当白天鹅靠近妮娜的时候，黑天鹅的隐秘躲在暗处。

sentences.english: Hilary:Do you take naps at noon or feel sleepy?
sentences.chinese: 你白天有睡午觉或是打瞌睡吗？

sentences.english: Candidates can be available during both shifts day and night.
sentences.chinese: 考生可同时可在白天和黑夜的变化。

sentences.english: Always drink when you are thirsty, and have water available during the day to hydrate regularly.
sentences.chinese: 总是喝当你渴了，有水可在白天到水合物定期。

sentences.english: In this month, Muslims from all around the world fast in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 在这个月里，世界各地的穆斯林在白天都要禁食。

sentences.english: If you order in the morning, we have more than four hours.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是在白天发的订单，就会超过四个小时。

sentences.english: It often sleeps in the day, and watches TV with me in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 它常在白天睡觉，晚上和我一起看电视。

sentences.english: He would be there for you , every day and every night.
sentences.chinese: 每一个白天，夜晚，他都陪着你。

sentences.english: The instrument is used when fly overwater in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 那仪器是在白天飞越水域时使用的。

sentences.english: James continued with her day job until she retired.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯继续白天的工作，直到她退休。

sentences.english: You are in my thoughts every minute of the day!
sentences.chinese: 白天，你每分每秒在我心里。

sentences.english: I have to work at daytime, so going to evening classes is the best choice for me.
sentences.chinese: 白天我要上班，所以上夜校是一个很好的选择。

sentences.english: They flew into Mogadishu in Black Hawk helicopters in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 他们在大白天乘坐黑鹰直升机飞入了摩加迪沙。

sentences.english: Whether day or night, summer or winter.
sentences.chinese: 不论白天黑夜，炎夏寒冬。

sentences.english: If the nights are cold, the days are hot.

definition: first half of the night (from nightfall to midnight)
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
midnight/in the middle of the night
